paragraphs.text: 4. You no longer have to catnap on your drive to work, or grab some micro-sleep during a meeting, or Weekend-at-Bernie’s-yourself by propping your head up with your hand while closing your eyes and pretend to look down at an important piece of paper for a suspiciously long time.
paragraphs.name: f416

paragraphs.text: 17. Does anyone else see that white van parked across the street? The one spying on you? It was obviously sent by your company to make sure you’re still working at 2 AM. Luckily, you’ve replicated the look of a despondent and exhausted employee by scrolling through the “trending” videos on YouTube. But just to make sure they know your only purpose in life is your job, you should probably stop leaving your desk to use the bathroom. And sleeping. And leaving the house.
paragraphs.name: b4c9

paragraphs.text: 15. You can laugh for no apparent reason.
paragraphs.name: 5ba5

paragraphs.text: 19. And if you somehow managed to survive outdoors, the minute you spotted one of the Eloi*, you’d scream, wet yourself and hiss like a feral cat.
paragraphs.name: 0f1c

47fdde3db13f.title: And dance in the kitchen while listening to Prince.

paragraphs.text: And dance in the kitchen while listening to Prince.
paragraphs.name: 98f2

b706965e9daa.title: The truth in this is what makes it so darn funny.

paragraphs.text: The truth in this is what makes it so darn funny. As a former work-from-home employee now not “working” (retired) I’d cite 18 out of 20 of these reasons why I’d resist going back to an office job.
paragraphs.name: 542f

85132dac8e94.title: Typical surface dweller, always gotta brag about your fancy pen cap and your fancy clean ears. 🙄

paragraphs.text: Typical surface dweller, always gotta brag about your fancy pen cap and your fancy clean ears. 🙄
paragraphs.name: df8a

paragraphs.text: PS: lol.
paragraphs.name: f35b

c3db51343639.title: I work from home and at least 12 of those reasons are true to my heart and lifestyle!

paragraphs.text: I work from home and at least 12 of those reasons are true to my heart and lifestyle! My cats and dog don’t ever care what I look (or perhaps smell) like, how often I sing or talk in accents in response to news stories, jump up to dance at particularly great music, or what bodily functions might embarrass little old Virgo me if I were in the office with humans. Critters are the best office mates!
paragraphs.name: 5af5

2f9cee0c6a7c.title: I bike to work. This explains some of the more terrifying drivers.

paragraphs.text: I bike to work. This explains some of the more terrifying drivers.
